DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I. Assess efficacy toxicity nitrocamptothecin patient metastatic melanoma . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord disease ( choroidal v nonchoroidal ) . Patients receive oral nitrocamptothecin daily day 1-5 . Treatment continue weekly least 8 week ( 2 course ) absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 28-74 patient ( 14-37 per stratum ) accrue study .
